GithubRepo (autotransform.repo.github)

The implementation for the GithubRepo.

class autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepo(params: autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepoParams)

Bases: autotransform.repo.git.GitRepo

A Repo that provides support for submitting changes as a pull request against a Github repo.

_params

Contains all git params as well as the Github repo name and any required labels.

Type

GithubRepoParams

_github_repo

The Github Repository being interacted with.

Type

Repository.Repository

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepo

Produces a GithubRepo from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle

Returns

An instance of the GithubRepo

Return type

GithubRepo

static get_github_object() → github.MainClass.Github

Authenticates with Github to allow API access via a token provided by AutoTransform configuration. If no token is provided a username + password will be used. Also allows use of a base URL for enterprise use cases.

Returns

An object allowing interaction with the Github API.

Return type

Github

get_github_repo() → github.Repository.Repository

Gets the Github repository being interacted with.

Returns

The Github repository being interacted with.

Return type

Repository.Repository

static get_type() → autotransform.repo.type.RepoType

Used to map Repo components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Repo

Return type

RepoType

submit(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch, schema_name: str) → None

Performs the normal submit for a git repo then submits a pull request against the provided Github repo.

Parameters

  • batch (Batch) – The Batch for which the changes were made.

  • schema_name (str) – The name of the schema for this change.

class autotransform.repo.github.GithubRepoParams

Bases: dict

The param type for a GithubRepo.
